short_description: joey and phoebe forget the pies
scene_description: joey and phoebe are asked to pick up the pies for dessert, but they forget and instead bring a prize-winning bird, ling. monica is furious and can't believe they forgot the one thing she asked them to do.

short_description: joey tries to convince chandler not to fire him
scene_description: joey tries to convince chandler not to fire him by offering to stay and gain the trust of the people they are trying to impress. joey promises to say nice things about chandler to fit in, but chandler is not convinced.

short_description: joey tries to hurry monica up
scene_description: joey tries to hurry monica up as she is struggling to get the pigs into the blanket. monica is frustrated and feels like joey is not taking the task seriously.
